title: Kanye West buys poo emoji cushion for his infamously minimal home while shopping in NY
text:
Kanye West's ultra-minimal Calabasas home has been the butt of many a joke.

But the Jesus Is King rapper seemed like he was taking a more playful approach to interior design when he picked up a fun new piece of decor while walking around New York City with wife Kim Kardashian on Friday.

West, 42, couldn't hide his grin while buying a smiling poop emoji cushion from a souvenir shop in Midtown Manhattan.

The finer things in life: Kanye West picked up a poop emoji cushion while stopping by an NYC gift shop on Friday

Amusing himself: West, 42, couldn't hide his grin as he picked up the novelty item

The smiling brown symbol looked like the perfect addition to Kayne's mausoleum-like white mansion.

Kanye accidentally revealed the inside of his home back in April of last year, when he was sparring with trolls online.

When people knocked the Jesus Walks rapper's support for President Trump, telling him he was stuck in the infamous 'sunken place' from Jordan Peele's horror favorite Get Out, Kanye tweeted back an image of his eerie abode asking 'Do this look like the sunken place [tears of laughter emoji.]

But instead of diffusing the jokes, his tweet only intensified the ridicule.

Haunted house? Kanye accidentally revealed the inside of his home back in April of last year, when he was sparring with trolls telling him he was stuck in the 'sunken place' from Jordan Peele's film Get Out

'Do this look like the sunken place': The rapper snaps from the inside of their home were very austere

Browsing: While Kanye looked at cheeky cushions Kim perused the shop's wares

Kanye's bit of downtime comes as the star's promised he'll go on tour 'right away,' following the release of his new album.

The rapper hasn't hit the road in three years but has admitted he's getting ready to take his new album Jesus is King, which dropped on Friday, to arenas around the world soon so that his fans can listen to the tracks live.

Speaking to TMZ.com, the Bound 2 hitmaker - who was walking with his wife Kim Kardashian West - said 'right away' when asked if he was going on tour with the album.

On the road again: Kanye said that he's ready to go on tour once again, after a three year hiatus

Lady in leather: Kim was clad in leather pants and a matching top while out

Kanye was last on tour in 2016 with his LP The Life of Pablo but was forced to cut the dates short when he was hospitalised for mental health issues in the December of that year.

Although he hasn't taken any of his albums on the road, Kanye has still been performing live as he's been holding his famous Sunday Service events for almost a year.

Meanwhile, just before Jesus is King dropped, Kanye - who is a born-again Christian - said he believes it's his 'job to spread the gospel' and let people know that he's 'free' now that he's 'a son of God'.

Date night: Kim and Kayne followed up their shopping trip with a movie

He explained: 'Now that I'm in service to Christ, my job is to spread the gospel, to let people know what Jesus has done for me.

'I've spread a lot of things. There was a time I was letting you know what high fashion had done for me, I was letting you know what the Hennessey had done for me, but now I'm letting you know what Jesus has done for me, and in that I'm no longer a slave, I'm a son now, a son of God. I'm free.'

He also claimed he was 'unquestionably, undoubtedly, the greatest human artist of all time'.
description: The Jesus Is King rapper seemed like he was taking a more playful approach to interior design when he picked up a fun new piece of decor while walking around New York with wife Kim Kardashian on Friday.
